title: Coaching Culture Design and Implementation Strategies Within Organizations

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Organizational Development (OD) Concepts, Leadership Experience, and Scientific Problem-Solving Methodologies
context.additional_context: A project-based assessment course for science field managers/leaders conducted in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment, emphasizing internal coaching relationships and leadership motivation.

learning_goals: Key elements for designing a coaching culture within an organization (leadership motivation, relational health, role modeling) can be identified and explained
Tools to evaluate success/failure factors in implementing a coaching culture can be developed by analyzing real-world cases
A coaching strategy roadmap tailored to the characteristics of science-based teams can be created and an implementation plan established
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
